content:
ColorDepth Enum

Definition

Specifies the number of colors used to display an image in an ImageList control.

In this Article

public enum ColorDepth
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
ColorDepth

Remarks

This enumeration is used by the ColorDepth property of the ImageList class.

Fields

Depth16Bit

A 16-bit image.
Depth24Bit

A 24-bit image.
Depth32Bit

A 32-bit image.
Depth4Bit

A 4-bit image.
Depth8Bit

An 8-bit image.
